blocks.text: Example 20. A barrier before a ticket office in a works was constructed out of sheet metal, which was bent to the form of an ellipse of major axis a = 15 in. and minor axis b = 9 in. The metal sheet required if the height of the barrier is 6 ft.

blocks.description: The height of the barrier is converted from feet to inches, and a constant K is introduced.

blocks.text: The table for the plotting reads:

blocks.caption: Table of values for the ellipse dimensions
